## Web3sdksAuthConfig interface

> This feature is currently in beta and may change based on feedback that we receive.

The configuration to use the react SDK with an \[auth\](https://docs.web3sdks.com/auth) server.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Web3sdksAuthConfig
```

## Properties

| Property                                                      | Modifiers | Type   | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| ------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [authUrl](./react.web3sdksauthconfig.authurl.md)              |           | string | **<i>(BETA)</i>** The backend URL of the authentication endoints. For example, if your endpoints are at <code>/api/auth/login</code>, <code>/api/auth/logout</code>, etc. then this should be set to <code>/api/auth</code>. |
| [domain](./react.web3sdksauthconfig.domain.md)                |           | string | **<i>(BETA)</i>** The frontend domain used to generate the login payload. This domain should match the domain used on your auth backend.                                                                                     |
| [loginRedirect?](./react.web3sdksauthconfig.loginredirect.md) |           | string | **<i>(BETA)</i>** <i>(Optional)</i> The URL to redirect to after a succesful login.                                                                                                                                          |
